install.name: Jomres Prices from
install.description: Shows the lower and upper prices for a property. Note these figures are only available when on the viewproperty or dobooking pages of a property.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: mosres_pf_roomsfrom
param.label: Before prices text
param.description: Enter text that goes at the beginning of the prices statement

param.name: mosres_pf_roomsto
param.label: Between prices text
param.description: Enter text that goes between the lower and upper prices

param.name: mosres_pf_pernight
param.label: After prices text
param.description: Enter text that goes after the prices
